data.terms:
1. Reward will be provided only if you have placed an order for this product. Make sure you raise a claim within 24 hours of ordering this product.

2. Limited time 100% cashback - Reward equal to the price of the product will be added to your Meesho Credits Balance on products from Saree, Kurtis & Kurta Sets and Suits & Dress Materials. For products from other categories, reward of 5x the price difference will be added to your Meesho Credits Balance.

3. Reward will be provided within 7 days after the return & exchange period of your order is over.

4. Reward will be provided only for cases where same product from same supplier is cheaper anywhere else. (including shipping price)

5. Prices found during sale-campaigns won't be considered eligible under this program

6. Reward will be processed only once per product.

7. If possible, please provide a link of the product (on the other website) to increase the chances of your claim being successful. This will help us verify your claim faster.

8. Meesho reserves the right to change the terms of this program and has the sole authority to decide genuineness of any claim.
data.refund_message: Get 100% cashback (as Meesho Credits) on select categories if you find a lower price anywhere else

data.title: Return Policy
data.message:
If there is any issue with the product, you can raise a Refund/ Exchange request within 7 days of receiving the order.

The product should be unused, undamaged and in original condition without any stain, scratches or holes.
